overview: Omar Galanti and his pal Christian Clay are spending their most eXXXtreme vacations in lovely Ibiza. Their agenda is as simple as it gets, search and destroy as many Russian asses as possible. 7 of their victims are the finest girls that Mother Russia could provide: Cathy Heaven, Erika Bellucci, Lindsey Olsen, Nataly Gold, Nisha, Polly Sunshine and Savannah Secret. Mira Sunset is a cock hungry Hungarian, they say she is always horny... just like her other Eastern friends.
title: Omar's Anal Adventures in Ibiza 2
